segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is so oblivious, just drying that plate like nothing else exists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so hard to reach the jar, and the stool looks like it’s about to give out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat, completely trusting her brother to get it for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a little comedy playing out in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is just the cherry on top of this chaotic sundae.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the mom will ever notice, or if the kids will get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Either way, it’s a moment I won’t forget anytime soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
